meanings.definition: The act of holding a meeting or conference with participants in different locations using telecommunications technology.
meanings.sent1: Teleconferencings allow people in different places to have meetings together.
meanings.sent2: We used teleconferencings to connect with our team members across the globe.
meanings.sent3: The teleconferencings made it seem like we were all in the same room, even though we were miles apart.
meanings.sent4: Through teleconferencings, the world feels smaller as we can communicate instantly with anyone, anywhere.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of teleconferencings saves time and money by eliminating the need for travel.

meanings.definition: The technology or equipment used for holding meetings or conferences with participants in different locations.
meanings.sent1: Our company invested in new teleconferencings to improve communication with remote teams.
meanings.sent2: The teleconferencings set up in the conference room allowed us to speak with clients overseas.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the teleconferencings suddenly stopped working, causing a moment of panic.
meanings.sent4: The teleconferencings acted as a bridge connecting us to colleagues in other countries.
meanings.sent5: With advanced teleconferencings, virtual meetings feel almost like being face-to-face.
